issue.title: [CI] Don't build doxygen docs in all of the conda builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14398](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14398). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We reuse the yml anchor to define the command for the conda docker builds: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docker-compose.yml#L240

The `true` argument instruments the script to build the documentation. We should only enable it in the conda-cpp build which is exercised on all commits and disable for the rest of the builds.
